2
1 which owns any interest in a corporation engaged in,
2 the business of publishing music or of manufacturing or
2 selling recordings of musical compositions;
4 “ (B) any corporation which directly or indirectly
5 is controlled by any person or corporation engaged in
6 the business of publishing music or of manufacturing or
7 selling recordings of musical compositions; or
8 “(C) any corporation which directly or indirectly
9 is controlled by any person or corporation which directly
10 or indirectly controls any corporation engaged in the
11 business of publishing music or of manufacturing or sell-
12 ing recordings of musical compositions.
13 “ (2) For purposes of paragraph (1), the term ‘control’
14 means, with respect to any corporation, the ownership of
15 more than 50 per centum of the voting stock of such cor-
16 poration, or the ownership of any property (including vot-
17 ing stock of such corporation) by reason of which a majority
18 of the members of the board of directors of such corporation
19 may be elected.
20 “(3) If any licensee is in violation of paragraph (1) on
21 the date of the enactment of this subsection, the provisions
22 of paragraph (1) shall be suspended with respect to such
23 licensee, for such time as the Commission determines to be
